channel.title: Can anyone help me with making myself admin on my server?
channel.description: The name pretty much says it all, if anyone can tell me or direct to making myself or other people admin I'll make you admin on my server, Thanks. ;)

item.title: Can anyone help me with making myself admin on my server?
item.dc:creator: @drabuzis drabuzis
item.description:
@drabuzis wrote:

go to characters find ur name and do character-rights 2 from 0 (1 will be mod)

Read full topic
item.source: Can anyone help me with making myself admin on my server?

item.title: Can anyone help me with making myself admin on my server?
item.dc:creator: @Reddy Reddy
item.description:
@Reddy wrote:

go into your server source file, click characters then click you’ re name, find playrights and make them to “3” for owner 4" for undercover admin “2” for admin 1" for mod…post if more help needed.

Read full topic
item.source: Can anyone help me with making myself admin on my server?

[quote=“rockstart4569, post:1, topic:141547”]The name pretty much says it all, if anyone can tell me or direct to making myself or other people admin I’ll make you admin on my server, Thanks. ;)[/quote]Make sure you are off when you do this.

item.title: Can anyone help me with making myself admin on my server?
item.dc:creator: @rockstart4569 rockstart4569
item.description:
@rockstart4569 wrote:

[quote=“supra s, post:2, topic:141547”]your server name -> charachters (map) -> then click on your name -> character-rights = 0 make it to 2 end save so you get : character-rights = 2[/quote] Do you Want to know my server so you can go on it?

Read full topic
